text: John James Monckton (28 October 1937 â€“ 29 June 2017) was an Australian backstroke swimmer. He won a silver medal in the 100-metre event at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne. Although he set multiple world records, he never won an Olympic gold medal.John Monckton . sports-reference.com He was born in Armidale, New South Wales. Monckton was inducted into the Sport Australia Hall of Fame in 1999. Monckton died in Nambucca Heads, New South Wales on 29 June 2017 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Australian swimmers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Australia Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: John Monckton
